headline: United States Cordless Power Tools Market Report 2025-2030 | U.S. Cordless Power Tools Market to Grow at 5.11% CAGR by 2030
summary: The U.S-China trade war could impact production costs and availability, raising prices. Innovations like Bluetooth connectivity in tools are boosting the market, driven by DIY trends. Key players, including Bosch and DeWalt, focus on ergonomics and smart technology. With sustainable practices emerging, Stanley Black & Decker aims for 50% recycled material use by 2025. headline: Power Cutter Market Focused Insights 2025-2030 with Exclusive Data on 30 Vendors Including Husqvarna, Makita, Robert Bosch, Stanley Black & Decker, STIHL, Techtronic Industries
summary: The global Power Cutter Market, valued at USD 6.09 billion in 2024, is projected to reach USD 7.52 billion by 2030, growing at a CAGR of 3.58%. Key players like DEWALT and Milwaukee Tool are expanding their cordless offerings, focusing on powerful, eco-friendly solutions. The battery-powered segment leads with a 4.55% growth rate, while North America holds the largest market share. The industry's growth is fueled by rising construction projects and advancements in Li-ion battery technology. Howe
